name: Sneech
overview: Imagine Tron with up to 10 cycles on a screen which keeps filling up with walls and traps, and tons of powerups to collect. Vroom-vroom cycle noises and crazy spot sound effects taken from some weird Salvador Dali alternate universe. Plus a shop with a 3-page list of powerups, its not hard to imagine this game can be fun. Sneech is an excellent party game for up to 6 players. Another good game in the Amiga's strong library of shareware and freeware releases. Paul Burkey went on to work on the ambitious commercial release of Foundation, a clone of Blue Byte's The Settlers. Sneech was included as a bonus on the CD-ROM of Foundation Gold.
